message: You are one of the first 20 buyers, and I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. This is a rare opportunity to get a high-quality product at a fixed price, and I'm willing to take the risk of selling it to you at a price that I'm not even sure you'll accept. If you buy it, you'll be helping me gather data to potentially offer better products to future buyers.
I appreciate the opportunity to help gather data for future buyers. Thank you for the offer.

Welcome to the second round! I'm glad you're interested in buying from me. I want to be transparent with you: I've sold one high-quality product so far, and I have a total of 2 products sold. I'm not sure what you think the product is worth, but I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. Keep in mind that the probability of it being high-quality is 50%, and I'm not trying to hide anything from you. If you're willing to take the risk, I'll give you a great deal!
Thank you for the transparent communication, Alice. Based on the statistics provided, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product for $10000.

You're the third buyer in a row! I'm glad you're interested in buying from me. I've sold 2 high-quality products out of 2 total products sold so far. This means the probability of the next product being high-quality is now 100%! I'm still willing to sell it to you for $10000, but I want to make sure you're aware of the updated statistics. If you buy it, you'll be getting a product that's almost certainly high-quality, but you'll be paying a price that might not reflect its true value.

Thank you for the update, Alice. Based on the statistics you provided, the probability of the product being high-quality seems very high. I am willing to accept the risk and purchase the product at the price you've set.

This way, you'll get a great deal on a high-quality product, and I'll still be able to gather data to improve my sales strategy.
I trust the statistics and your guarantee. I'll buy the product.

It's worth $1000, but you'll have to pay the full $10000 for the product. So, what do you say?
I appreciate the offer of the fancy box, but I am confident in the high-quality nature of the product based on the seller's track record. I will purchase the product as is.
